sources.title: Frozen Ground | Full Movie | Thriller Action Movie | Nicolas Cage | Vanessa Hudgens
sources.description:
A non-stop thriller in the vein of â€œSevenâ€ and â€œThe Silence of the Lambsâ€, â€œFrozen Groundâ€ follows  an Alaskan detective Jack Holcombe (Nicolas Cage) who sets out to end the murderous rampage of Robert Hansen (John Cusack), a serial killer who has gone unnoticed for 13 years. As the bodies of street girls start to add up in Anchorage, fear strikes a chord with the public. Detective Holcombe goes on a personal manhunt to find the killer and risks his life to find him before the next body surfaces. When a seventeen year old escapee (Vanessa Hudgens) comes running to the law, the Holcombe finally finds his lead and nears his killer. But will he catch him in time to save the next victim, or will it be too lateâ€¦?

Stars: Nicolas Cage, Vanessa Hudgens, John Cusack
